name: Fleeting JKT
description:
Fleeting JKT is a submission to Yaoi Jam 2020. It's a spin-off for a future BL visual novel project simply titled Fleeting. The two featured characters, Jericho and Kaimana, are planned love interests.

JKT stands for Jan Ken Tease. You see, it's a strip tease game, BUT ALSO a teaser for the main title, Fleeting.

FEATURES

  • Kaimana strip teasing you, but don't worry. It's SFW.
  • Kaimana's abs in Full HD (1920 x 1080)!
  • 1 animated, parallax CG.
  • 2 endings. You win or you lose.
  • No Save/Load.
  • Rock. Paper. Scissors.

CREDITS

Art, UI, Programming     xxmissarichanxx

Music     Demon Soul, Pocket Sound, TeknoAXE

Parallax Code     Elmiwisa

Starfield Code     Human Bolt Diary

Hidden Quick Menu Code     ileikturtles
